assistant-modal.title: Properties
assistant-modal.description: Use the existing product description, or add your own text, to automatically generate suggestions for properties and property values.

generate-button.tooltip: Change the product description to be able to generate new suggestions.

assistant-modal.button-description: Generating new property suggestions will overwrite existing suggestions.

no-result.title: No suggestions
no-result.message: Based on this product description there are no suggestions available.

no-suggestions.title: No new suggestions
no-suggestions.message: Based on this product description there are no new suggestions available. All suggested properties and property values have already been assigned.

help-text.to-short: Description must be at least 200 characters long.
help-text.to-long: Description must not be longer than 4000 characters.

table.error-message: The service is currently not available. Please try again later.
